types.name: Barcode
types.summary: Simple barcode helpers with fluent and static APIs.

types.name: Barcode1D
types.summary: A simple 1D barcode represented as an alternating sequence of bar/space segments.

types.name: BarcodeDecoded
types.summary: Result of decoding a 1D barcode payload.

types.name: BarcodeDecodeOptions
types.summary: Options controlling how 1D barcode decoding behaves.

types.name: BarcodeEasy
types.summary: One-line barcode helpers with sane defaults.

types.name: BarcodeEncoder
types.summary: Encodes supported barcode symbologies into a CodeGlyphX.Barcode1D model.

types.name: BarSegment
types.summary: Represents a single run in a 1D barcode, expressed in module units.

types.name: Code11ChecksumPolicy
types.summary: Policy for handling optional Code 11 checksum characters.

types.name: Code39ChecksumPolicy
types.summary: Policy for handling optional Code39 checksum characters.

types.name: CodeGlyphBudget
types.summary: Provides a temporary decode time budget for operations that honor it.

types.name: CodeGlyphDecoded
types.summary: Result of decoding a QR or barcode symbol.

types.name: DataMatrixCode
types.summary: Simple Data Matrix helpers with fluent and static APIs.

types.name: DecodeBatchDiagnostics
types.summary: Aggregated diagnostics for a batch decode run.

types.name: Gs1
types.summary: Helpers for building and encoding GS1 element strings (GS1-128).

types.name: Gs1Element
types.summary: Represents a GS1 element (AI + data) with explicit length semantics.

types.name: ImageDecodeOptions
types.summary: Options for decoding from image sources (non-QR).

types.name: MatrixBarcodeEncoder
types.summary: Encodes 2D barcode symbologies into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

types.name: MatrixOptions
types.summary: Simplified rendering options for 2D matrices (Data Matrix, PDF417).

types.name: MicroQrCode
types.summary: A generated Micro QR code (modules + metadata).

types.name: MicroQrDecoded
types.summary: Result of decoding a Micro QR code payload.

types.name: MicroQrDecoder
types.summary: Decodes Micro QR codes from a module grid.

types.name: MsiChecksumPolicy
types.summary: Policy for handling optional MSI checksum digits.

types.name: Otp
types.summary: Simple OTP helpers with fluent and static APIs.

types.name: OtpAlgorithm
types.summary: Hash algorithm identifiers used in otpauth:// URIs.

types.name: OtpAuthPayload
types.summary: Parsed contents of an otpauth:// URI.

types.name: OtpAuthType
types.summary: OTP token type for otpauth:// URIs.

types.name: OtpQrDecoder
types.summary: Convenience decoder for OTP QR payloads.

types.name: OtpQrPreset
types.summary: Opinionated QR presets for OTP URIs.

types.name: OtpQrSafety
types.summary: Safety checks for OTP QR rendering parameters.

types.name: OtpQrSafetyReport
types.summary: Result of OTP QR scan safety evaluation.

types.name: Pdf417Code
types.summary: Simple PDF417 helpers with fluent and static APIs.

types.name: PixelFormat
types.summary: Supported raw pixel formats for QR decoding.

types.name: PlesseyChecksumPolicy
types.summary: Policy for handling Plessey CRC validation.

types.name: QR
types.summary: Simple QR helpers with fluent and static APIs.

types.name: QrArtSafety
types.summary: Evaluates QR art/render options for scan safety.

types.name: QrArtSafetyReport
types.summary: Safety score and warnings for QR art/custom styling.

types.name: QrArtWarning
types.summary: QR art warning with a short message.

types.name: QrArtWarningKind
types.summary: Warning kinds for QR art safety evaluation.

types.name: QrCodeEncoder
types.summary: Encodes QR codes (byte mode + optional Kanji mode).

types.name: QrDecoded
types.summary: Result of decoding a QR code payload.

types.name: QrDecodeFailureReason
types.summary: High-level failure reasons for QR decoding.

types.name: QrDecodeInfo
types.summary: Diagnostics returned by QR decoding attempts.

types.name: QrDecodeProfile
types.summary: Speed/accuracy profile for pixel-based QR decoding.

types.name: QrDecoder
types.summary: Decodes QR codes from a module grid or from raw pixels (clean images).

types.name: QrDiagnosticsDump
types.summary: Builds and writes diagnostic dumps for QR pixel decoding attempts.

types.name: QrEasy
types.summary: One-line QR generation helpers with sane defaults.

types.name: QrFnc1Mode
types.summary: Indicates presence of FNC1 mode in a QR payload.

types.name: QrImageDecoder
types.summary: Decodes QR codes from raw pixel buffers.

types.name: QrPixelDebug
types.summary: Debug visualizations for pixel-based QR decoding.

types.name: QrPixelDebugMode
types.summary: Debug visualization modes for pixel-based QR decoding.

types.name: QrPixelDebugOptions
types.summary: Options for QR pixel debug rendering.

types.name: QrPixelDecodeInfo
types.summary: Diagnostics returned by pixel-based QR decoding attempts.

types.name: QrPresets
types.summary: Ready-to-use QR presets with safe defaults for common scenarios.

types.name: QrRenderStyle
types.summary: Style presets for easy QR rendering.

types.name: QrStructuredAppend
types.summary: Structured append metadata for multi-symbol QR payloads.

types.name: QrTextEncoding
types.summary: QR text encodings supported for payloads and ECI.

types.name: AustraliaPostCustomerEncodingTable
types.summary: Customer information encoding tables for Australia Post customer barcodes.

types.name: AustraliaPostDecoded
types.summary: Decoded Australia Post customer barcode information.

types.name: AztecEncodeOptions
types.summary: Options for future Aztec encoding support.

types.name: DataBar14Decoder
types.summary: Decodes GS1 DataBar-14 symbols (Truncated / Omni / Stacked).

types.name: DataBar14Encoder
types.summary: Encodes GS1 DataBar-14 symbols (Truncated / Omni / Stacked).

types.name: DataBarExpandedDecoder
types.summary: Decodes GS1 DataBar Expanded symbols (linear and stacked).

types.name: DataBarExpandedEncoder
types.summary: Encodes GS1 DataBar Expanded symbols (linear and stacked).

types.name: DataMatrixEncodingMode
types.summary: High-level data encoding modes for Data Matrix.

types.name: KixDecoder
types.summary: Decodes KIX (Royal Mail 4-state, without headers) barcodes.

types.name: KixEncoder
types.summary: Encodes KIX (Royal Mail 4-state, without headers) barcodes.

types.name: QrContactAddressOrder
types.summary: Address field ordering in contact payloads.

types.name: QrParsedPayload
types.summary: Parsed QR payload with detected type and optional raw value.

types.name: QrPayload
types.summary: Helpers for building common QR payload strings (URLs, Wi‑Fi, vCard, and basic URI schemes).

types.name: QrPayloadData
types.summary: QR payload with optional encoding/version defaults.

types.name: QrPayloadDetectOptions
types.summary: Options that control payload auto-detection heuristics.

types.name: QrPayloadParseOptions
types.summary: Options controlling payload parsing and validation.

types.name: QrPayloadParser
types.summary: Parses QR payload strings into structured data when possible.

types.name: QrPayloads
types.summary: Helpers for building common QR payloads with recommended defaults.

types.name: QrPayloadValidationResult
types.summary: Validation result for parsed QR payloads.

types.name: QrRussiaPaymentEncoding
types.summary: Encoding marker for Russia payment order payloads.

types.name: MicroPdf417Decoder
types.summary: Decodes MicroPDF417 symbols from a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

types.name: MicroPdf417Encoder
types.summary: Encodes MicroPDF417 symbols into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

types.name: Pdf417Compaction
types.summary: High-level compaction mode selection for PDF417.

types.name: Pdf417Decoded
types.summary: Result of decoding a PDF417 symbol.

types.name: ColorUtils
types.summary: Helpers for converting colors to CSS-friendly strings.

types.name: ImageFormat
types.summary: Known image formats supported by CodeGlyphX.Rendering.ImageReader.

types.name: ImageInfo
types.summary: Basic image metadata returned by ImageReader.TryReadInfo.

types.name: ImageReader
types.summary: Auto-detects common image formats and decodes to RGBA buffers.

types.name: LogoBuilder
types.summary: Helpers for building simple logo pixels.

types.name: QrLogoOptions
types.summary: Options for embedding a PNG logo inside a QR render (SVG/HTML).

types.name: RenderExtensions
types.summary: Convenience extension methods for rendered outputs.

types.name: RenderIO
types.summary: Simple file and stream helpers for rendered assets.

types.name: MatrixAsciiRenderOptions
types.summary: Rendering options for ASCII matrix output.

types.name: BmpReader
types.summary: Decodes BMP images to RGBA buffers (uncompressed 24/32/8-bit).

types.name: BmpWriter
types.summary: Writes BMP images from RGBA buffers.

types.name: MatrixBmpRenderer
types.summary: Renders generic 2D matrices to BMP images (BGRA32).

types.name: QrBmpRenderer
types.summary: Renders QR modules to a BMP image (BGRA32).

types.name: BarcodeEpsRenderer
types.summary: Renders 1D barcodes to an EPS image.

types.name: EpsWriter
types.summary: Minimal EPS writer for embedding RGB images.

types.name: MatrixEpsRenderer
types.summary: Renders generic 2D matrices to an EPS image.

types.name: QrEpsRenderer
types.summary: Renders QR modules to an EPS image.

types.name: GifReader
types.summary: Decodes GIF images to RGBA buffers (first frame only).

types.name: MatrixHtmlRenderOptions
types.summary: Options for rendering generic 2D matrices to HTML.

types.name: IcoReader
types.summary: Decodes ICO/CUR images to RGBA buffers (embedded PNG or BMP/DIB).

types.name: IcoWriter
types.summary: Writes ICO files embedding PNG images.

types.name: BarcodeJpegRenderer
types.summary: Renders 1D barcodes to a JPEG image (baseline, 4:4:4).

types.name: JpegReader
types.summary: Decodes baseline and progressive JPEG images to RGBA buffers (SOF0/SOF2, 8-bit, Huffman).

types.name: MatrixJpegRenderer
types.summary: Renders generic 2D matrices to a JPEG image (baseline, 4:4:4).

types.name: QrJpegRenderer
types.summary: Renders QR modules to a JPEG image (baseline, 4:4:4).

types.name: PamReader
types.summary: Decodes PAM (P7) images to RGBA buffers.

types.name: PamWriter
types.summary: Writes PAM (P7) images from RGBA buffers.

types.name: PbmReader
types.summary: Decodes PBM (P4/P1) images to RGBA buffers.

types.name: PbmWriter
types.summary: Writes PBM (P4) images from RGBA buffers.

types.name: BarcodePdfRenderer
types.summary: Renders 1D barcodes to a PDF image.

types.name: MatrixPdfRenderer
types.summary: Renders generic 2D matrices to a PDF image.

types.name: PdfWriter
types.summary: Minimal PDF writer for embedding RGB images.

types.name: QrPdfRenderer
types.summary: Renders QR modules to a PDF image.

types.name: PgmReader
types.summary: Decodes PGM (P5/P2) images to RGBA buffers.

types.name: PgmWriter
types.summary: Writes PGM (P5) images from RGBA buffers.

types.name: BarcodePngRenderer
types.summary: Renders 1D barcodes to a PNG image (RGBA8).

types.name: MatrixPngRenderer
types.summary: Renders generic 2D matrices to PNG images (RGBA8).

types.name: MatrixPngRenderOptions
types.summary: Options for rendering generic 2D matrices to PNG.

types.name: PngReader
types.summary: Decodes PNG images to RGBA buffers.

types.name: QrPngEyeOptions
types.summary: Styling overrides for QR finder (eye) patterns.

types.name: QrPngGradientOptions
types.summary: Options for a foreground gradient fill.

types.name: QrPngGradientType
types.summary: Gradient types for QR PNG rendering.

types.name: QrPngLogoOptions
types.summary: Options and pixel data for a centered logo overlay in a QR PNG.

types.name: QrPngRenderer
types.summary: Renders QR modules to a PNG image (RGBA8).

types.name: PpmReader
types.summary: Decodes PPM/PGM (P6/P5) images to RGBA buffers.

types.name: PpmWriter
types.summary: Writes PPM (P6) images from RGBA buffers.

types.name: MatrixSvgRenderOptions
types.summary: Options for rendering generic 2D matrices to SVG.

types.name: TgaReader
types.summary: Decodes TGA images to RGBA buffers (uncompressed true-color/grayscale).

types.name: TgaWriter
types.summary: Writes TGA images from RGBA buffers (uncompressed).

types.name: XbmReader
types.summary: Decodes XBM images to RGBA buffers.

types.name: XbmWriter
types.summary: Writes XBM (X Bitmap) images from RGBA buffers.

types.name: XpmReader
types.summary: Decodes XPM images to RGBA buffers.

types.name: XpmWriter
types.summary: Writes XPM (X Pixmap) images from RGBA buffers.

types.name: RoyalMailFourStateDecoder
types.summary: Decodes Royal Mail 4-State Customer Code (RM4SCC) barcodes.

types.name: RoyalMailFourStateEncoder
types.summary: Encodes Royal Mail 4-State Customer Code (RM4SCC) barcodes.
